# Draft:Corning Ware Vintage. Many people buy items under the umbrella of "vintage".. One significant methad to determime vintage itege under Dornign "Ware is the date tha that Mico

Many people buy items under the umbrella of "vintage".. One significant method to determine vintage is by the signatures of the producers.  "Corning Ware" produced many pieces of cookware but around the 1970 they added Microwave safe to the dish signature. What was that date?
